BEYONCE'S SPECIAL GUEST!

Beyonce & Megan Thee Stallion performed their hot hit together the Savage Remix live for the first time ever in their hometown of, Houston at the Renaissance Concert. As Megan took the stage, Beyonce said, “Don't she make you proud, Houston? She makes me proud.”

BEYONCE'S 42ND BIRTHDAY!

Beyonce celebrated her 42nd birthday on stage in Los Angeles on, September 4th in front of a star-studded audience. Diana Ross appeared on stage at SoFi Stadium to sing Happy Birthday, which brought Beyonce to tears.

"Thank you so much. You are so amazing. This is the legendary Diana Ross," Beyonce told the crowd. In 2019, the roles were reversed when Beyonce sang "Happy Birthday" to Ross at her 75th birthday.

Beyoncé Knowles-Carter Receives Key to the City, Honorary Mayor!

The City of Santa Clara has named Beyoncé Knowles-Carter the title of Honorary Mayor for Aug. 30, the day of her “Renaissance World Tour” concert at Levis Stadium. Beyoncé will also receive the Key tothe City. This marks her fifth appearance at Levi’s Stadium. Her previous performances include the 2018 “On the Run II Tour”, the “Formation Tour” in 2016 and her debut performance at the stadium during the Super Bowl 50 halftime

BEYONCE'S TOUR BREAKS ALL TIME RECORD!

Beyoncé's Renaissance World Tour' has become the highest-grossing tour by a woman artist in history-- at more than $461 million, according to reports. Chart Data said the last titleholder was Madonna for her "Sticky & Sweet Tour," back in 2008-09. Beyoncé's 'Renaissance' tour breaks all-time record.
